mapper.insert: insert into bbs(content, writer, group_no, img) values (#{content}, #{writer}, #{group_no}, #{img})
mapper.update: update bbs set content = #{content}, img = #{img} where bbs_no = #{bbs_no}
mapper.select: select *, (select count(*) from bbslike where bbs_no = b.bbs_no) as like_cnt, (select count(*) from bbsreply where bbs_no = b.bbs_no) as cmt_cnt from bbs b where bbs_no = #{bbs_no}
select count(*) from bbs where group_no = #{group_no}
mapper.update: update bbs set hit = hit + 1 where bbs_no = #{bbs_no}
mapper.select: select count(*) from ( select *, (select count(*) from bbslike where bbs_no = b.bbs_no) as like_cnt, (select count(*) from bbsreply where bbs_no = b.bbs_no) as cmt_cnt from bbs b where group_no = #{group_no} ) as b2 where hit >= 30 and like_cnt >= 3

select *, (select count(*) from bbslike where bbs_no = b.bbs_no) as like_cnt from bbs b, bbsgroup b2 where b.group_no = b2.group_no and `date` between date_add(now(),interval -1 month) and now() order by hit desc, bbs_no desc limit 20
